attributes.action: Veto and / or offer a referendum on the EU treaty due to the limited opt out on Justice and Home affairs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest EU treaty was meant to have an opt out for the UK on Justice and Home affairs, but now it has been found out that the opt out will only be secure for five years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
